entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:54 PM MDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with rain in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:54 PM MDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early in the evening. Clearing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 5:54 PM MDT Monday 10 April 2023
